ygData.subject: Re: Offtopic: Asheron's Call vs. Everquest
ygData.msgSnippet: Some things do need fixing though like the rogue skills, druids at high levels ( they can t go to any dungeons because of high fire resist ), and in my opinion
ygData.messageBody:
Some things do need fixing though like the rogue skills, druids at high
levels ( they can't go to any dungeons because of high fire resist ), and in
my opinion Necro research. The problem with necro research is that the words
are impossible to find. Currently on E'ci two people on the whole server
have the level 34 Necro pet spell, the first research spell! Nobody levels
34-50 besides those two people have a pet spell better then the level 29
spell which is the last pet spell. Something is definitly wrong here. As for
wizards and Ice Comet at least they know where to look.

Conaldar
Naeeldar
-----Original Message-----
From: Patrick Pichette <poptart77@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, July 16, 1999 9:33 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Offtopic: Asheron's Call vs. Everquest


>From: "Patrick Pichette" <poptart77@...>
>
>So many people complaining about downtime and exp loss and so on and so
>forth.. have any of you read what Asheron's Call is doing? They don't want
>to penalize people too harshly with exp so they decided that when you die,
>you lose a few of your best items and a percentage of your money. How's
>that for not penalizing people to travel? You all complain now at what
>Everquest does.. be grateful that it's the best game of it's genre at the
>moment. Nothing even comes close to it and I doubt anything will for a
>while. Yes, it has its quirks. And yes, it's taking a long time to fix
>them all. But would you have preferred waiting another year while beta
>testers worked out all the bugs or enjoy playing the game now and live with
>the bugs as they get fixed. The more people are playing the more bugs are
>found quicker and resolved quicker. Now, there's just a matter of priority
>as to what to fix first. And quit trying to make every frigging class the
>exact same as the other class. You want to be able to bind? Play a damn
>spell caster. You want to be able to run fast? Play a damn bard or shaman
>or something. You want to dish out lots of DD? Play a wizard. Just quit
>your whining and be grateful that you can't do exactly the same thing as
>every other character in the game.
>
>I'm just so tired of hearing people wanting their characters to be god so
>they can kill everything in site.. go play Doom and enter god mode if you
>want to do that and see how much fun it is after a while.
>
>Just my pipe blowing,
>
>Pietree
>
>
